annotation.text: Direction field for x prime equals x times the quantity one minus x minus two times x times y and y prime equals y times the quantity one minus y minus two times x times y with a solution curve begins at the point (1.4, 1.3) and travels down and left and then curves back towards the point (1,0). The x nullclines are given by the lines x equals zero and y equals one-half times the quantity one minus x. The y nullclines are given by y equals zero and y equals one minus two times x.
